title: U.S. Coal Companies Ride Exports To Booming Business
teaser: One might expect the U.S. coal industry to be reeling from the glut of low-cost natural gas and the regulations imposed by the Environmental Protection Agency. Instead, coal companies are doing a booming business in exports to Europe and Asia.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
